ygData.subject: Re: Skull topped staff
ygData.msgSnippet: AARRRGGGHHH, (By the way, did you know that aarrrggghhh is an official Scrabble word) Not again.  It s a rumor nothing more.  The staff everyone is seeing is
ygData.messageBody:
AARRRGGGHHH, (By the way, did you know that aarrrggghhh is an official Scrabble word)

Not again. It's a rumor nothing more. The staff everyone is seeing is called the Staff of Writhing. It comes from a high level mob, and not the Priest of
Dischord. Here are the stats

1hb
9Dmg
33Delay
Effect: Chaotic Feedback

Thats all I could weasil out of the guy. He wouldn't give me the zone let alone the mob who carries it.
Oh well I tried.

Cheers,
Malkin
Wielder of the Worn Great Staff

greenidminx@... wrote:

> From: greenidminx@...
>
> I've heard a vague rumor that it's possible to find a skull somewhere to attach to the top of the runed totem staff, thus making it a different/better weapon.
>
> Is this possible? If so, where do you get the skull, and how is it attached to the staff?
>
> Thank you!
>
> Ximena, Wizard, Fennin Ro
>
>
